mapper.select: select userId as friendId, userName as friendName from member where userId != #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into message(receiver, sender, msgContent) value(#{receiver}, #{sender},#{msgContent})
mapper.select: select msgId, sender, msgContent, msgWrittenDate from message where receiver = #{receiver} order by msgId desc
mapper.update: update message set isRead = 'Y' where msgId = #{msgId}
